metadata.description: Claude Code plugins for Move smart contract development and blockchain SDK integration on Aptos, Movement, and Supra ecosystems

plugins.name: aptos-move-contract
plugins.description: Comprehensive Aptos Move smart contract development guide. Includes module templates, testing patterns, on-chain randomness, token vesting, ve(3,3) DEX implementation, and third-party dependency integration.

plugins.name: aptos-ts-sdk
plugins.description: Aptos TypeScript SDK guide for building dApps. Covers client setup, account management (Ed25519/Secp256k1), transactions, reading blockchain data, NFT operations, multi-agent and sponsored transactions.
